Title: MY Home
Body: It's my home at Rutgers (:ALL YOU WANNA KNOW ABOUT ME:) My first friends in the US Interesting people I met in the US My favorite sports How I keep in touch with the rest of the world My favorite picture Send me your comments About me and what I do here Born in India in the post-indepedence era, I spent most of my younger days in Madurai, the temple city, in the state of Tamil Nadu .
